QuestData.Title: Where are the Pools
QuestData.Description: Perhaps these mogu know where the pools are.$b$bOur scouts have reported seeing a commander along the southern side of the Ruins of Dojan.$b$bKill him and take whatever information he is carrying. They should lead you to the pool.
QuestData.CompletionText: <You sense the presence of Lorekeeper Vaeldrin, then hear his voice within your mind.>$b$bHmm. I'm still not sure about these references to "torture" regarding the Pools of Youth.
QuestData.RewardText: Well done, $p. Hmm, it looks like the mogu are here to collect ancient relics and weapons from their forgotten dynasty. That is a problem we can face later though.$b$bAh! Here is a reference to the Pools of Youth.
